title: Cyberpunk 2077: CD Projekt Red’s Apology - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.14.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate can be!

Go to https://bit.ly/kindafunnydecember to get cozy at home this holiday season!

Go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games to get 10% off your first order and free shipping!

Greg and Tim talk through CD Projekt Red's #Cyberpunk2077 apology, talk about EA buying Codemasters, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:50 - Housekeeping
I tried calling PlayStation to get Blessing’s Trophies, but it didn’t go well. Check out the call on youtube.com/kindafunny
Andy is going ot be streaming Cyberpunk 2077 showing off Ray Tracing and all that goodness on his Nvidia RTX 3080 Tuesday December 15th from  11-1 PT
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:50 - CD Projekt Red Apologizes to fans, employees
00:12:05 - CDPR put out a statement last night "apologizing" for the poor performance of Cyberpunk on last gen consoles. - Best Friends Q:Ayub from Ottawa
00:23:10 - Should the last-gen versions of Cyberpunk 2077 have been canceled, or could more time and less crunch have saved this mess? - Best Friends Q:Marc Starvaggi (star-vah-jee)
00:24:45 - Is the Cyberpunk launch worse than Anthem? - Best Friends Q:Julian - The Gluten Free Gamer
00:37:45 -  Is Cyberpunk going to give Stadia the push to be relevant again? - Best Friends Q:Ignacio Rojas
00:41:15 - What is the wisest move now? - Best Friends Q:Mitch Krassin
00:45:08 -  Ad
00:49:50 - HOLY SHIT VIN DIESEL IS THE PRESIDENT OF GAMES!
00:52:02 - EA Buying Codemasters, Dean @ GamesBeat
00:56:02 - Submit Your Space Jam: A New Legacy video game idea, Sarah Bond @ Xbox
00:58:50 - Nintendo Indie World Showcase Tomorrow
01:00:00 - Out today
01:01:12 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Imran

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

today you can contact us for a week up until december 21st 2020. humbly the heads of studio and then ps pc gamers will also be getting regular updates and fixes improving the game now tim we can of course start right there jump right into it but i feel like just giving laying it all out here right because uh after we had gone off the air of course uh jason schreier over at bloomberg on friday put up a different story a different story in a similar vein of everything we're talking about basically saying cyberpunk devs are still getting their bonuses again this is jason schreier at bloomberg executives at polish video game publisher cd project sa took responsibility for the buggy release of the highly anticipated title cyberpunk 2077 this week telling staff on friday in an email obtained by bloomberg that they will receive their full bonuses no matter how the game is reviewed previously cd projekt developers were told they would receive extra pay based on the game's critical performance

bloomberg that they will receive their full bonuses no matter how the game is reviewed previously cd projekt developers were told they would receive extra pay based on the game's critical performance cyberpunk 2077 which came out thursday is one of the one of the year's biggest games and a monumental release for the polish publisher which only makes a few titles every few years it only makes new titles every few years the sci-fi role-playing game sold more than 8 million copies in pre-orders before launch and has been acclaimed for its mechanics and story but slammed for the number of glitches and bugs as of friday cyberpunk 2077 had had a 90 out of 100 on the review aggregation website metacritic a strong score that has nonetheless disappointed shareholders if that score dips below 90 it may no longer meet the threshold that cd project had originally set for bonus payouts quote we initially had a bonus system that was focused on the game's ratings and the ignition and the release
